head.supplied: 22/5/66 ¶ Dear Mr Fitzgibbon ¶ ¶ The fences at the Yarra park are very defective & hence our willows on the Yarra will continually be in danger, especially when the river is low. Will you kindly give...

div.p: No. 1584, unit 732, VPRS 3181/P Town Clerk's file series 1, VA 511 Melbourn, Public Record Office, Victoria.

The fences at the Yarra park are very defective & hence our willows on the Yarra will continually be in danger, especially when the river is low. Will you kindly give this matter your favorable consideration

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
